title: Enhancing Data Science Practical Competencies: Cognitive Tutor-Based Proportional Reasoning Skill Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and basic understanding of proportional relationships
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can mathematically model proportional relationships in authentic language problem situations
Students reduce proportional reasoning errors by over 30% based on CT (Cognitive Tutor) feedback

Students can design 1 AI model applying proportional reasoning to language analysis tasks (e.g., sentiment classification, named entity recognition) through PBL (Problem-Based Learning) and submit a project report with performance evaluation results achieving ≥75% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
